Dow closes up more than 200 on strong July job news

Scenes from Day 7 of the Olympics

Track started with a bang, US swimmers won more medals in the pool, and US women's soccer advanced.

R.I.'s Beisel wins bronze in 200m race

Elizabeth Beisel (left) placed third and US swimmer Missy Franklin broke a world record in winning the gold in the backstroke. (Boston Globe)
